items.title: Pink Rabbit: Human Rights Commission and #YermaInAdelaide
items.content_text:
Aired 6:30 PM Thursday 31 October 2019 on Radio Adealaide 101.5 and JOY 94.9 in Melbourne.

31 October 2019: Human Rights Commission and #YermaInAdelaide




  This week, we explore the results of a survey conducted by the Australian Human Rights Commission about sexual harassment in retail and fast food industries.



  Then, we chat with playwright Holly Brindley about gender roles in #yermainadelaide and how the adaptation places its female protagonist into a modern context.


Listen on Radio Adelaide.
items.content_html:

items.title: The Milkbar: A Game of Australian "Would You Rather?"
items.content_text:
Episode 8: A Game of Australian “Would You Rather?”




  In this special edition of “Would You Rather?”, we discover Benito is a Mark Holden hater, while Mariah has a Bananas in Pyjamas flashback.


Listen on Apple Podcasts.

items.title: The Milkbar: VMAs & Facebook Advice Groups
items.content_text:
The first episode of my new podcast on postup called The Milkbar, co-hosted with Benito Carbone, postup’s Editor-in-Chief, we discuss the week’s trending and culture news.

Episode 1: VMAs & Facebook Advice Groups




  The VMAs were bad, advice groups are also bad.


Listen on Apple Podcasts.

Subscribe to The Milkbar on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and where ever you find podcasts.
